pages.text: $(l)Plants vs Zombies mod$() added some $(bred)player resources$(), including $(bgreen)TreeLevel$(), $(byellow)SunNum$(), $(bgreen)EnergyNum$() and so on. If you didn't change the config file, you will see 2 strange gui on the corner of the screen in game, which are related to the player resources.

Before explaining them, you should know $(bgreen)The Tree of Wisdom$() first. The Tree of Wisdom is not a common tree, it's invisible and intangible and it rooted in player's soul and integrated with the player. In the world of PVZ, $(l)The Tree of Wisdom can help players collect and store resources such as sun and energy and fight side by side with players$().

$(bgreen)Tree Level:$()$(br)It is independent of the default mc level, can also be called the PVZ Level.$(br)$(l)Usage: $()The higher the level is, $(byellow)the higher upper limit of SunNum$() and the more card you can use.$(br)$(l)Display:$() The upper left corner of the screen or command to view.$(br)$(l)Upgrade method:$() player or its plants kill zombies can gain some xp($(red)Except for the zombies not belong to pvzmod$()).

$(byellow)SunNum:$()$(br)$(l)The upper limit of SunNum$() will increase when TreeLevel increases.$(br)$(l)Usage:$() Using $(bred)Summon Cards$() and some tools will consume SunNum.$(br)$(l)Display:$() The upper left corner of the screen or command to view.$(br)$(l)Obtaining method:$() collide with $(l)Sun$() entity or use $(byellow)Resource Collector$() or eat $(byellow)SunStorageSapling$().

$(bgreen)EnergyNum:$()$(br)$(l)the upper limit of energy beans$() can be bought from $(red)Crazy Dave$().$(br)$(l)Usage:$() player using $(bred)sword$() enchanted with $(bpurple)energy transfer$() right click plant will make plant $(bred)in super mode$() and consume energy.$(br)$(l)Display:$() The lower left corner of the screen or command to view.$(br)Obtaining method: collide with $(bgreen)Energy$() entity or use $(byellow)Resource Collector$().

$(borange)Money:$()$(br)the general currency of shops, its upper limit is 9999999.$(br)$(l)Usage:$() purchase some $(bred)Upgrade Plant Cards$() and tools.$(br)$(l)Display:$() The upper left corner of the screen or command.$(br)$(l)Obtaining method:$() collide with $(borange)Coin$() entity or use $(byellow)Resource Collector$().

$(bblue)GemNum:$()$(br)the special currency of shops, its upper limit is 9999999.$(br)$(l)Usage:$() purchase some $(bred)Plant Enjoy Cards$() and special tools.$(br)$(l)Display:$() The upper left corner of the screen or command.$(br)$(l)Obtaining method:$() collide with $(bblue)Jewel$() entity or use $(byellow)Resource Collector$().

$(bred)Tips:$()$(br)$(l)you can use command /playerstats to change or query your resource.$()$(br)$(red)If you can't see jewel num or money or tree level on the upper left coner, please press key(left <- or -> right) to toggle display.$()$(br)
